actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide that United States District Court for Eastern District of New York shall also be held at Town of Hempstead.

summary.text: Adds the town of Hempstead to the places where the United States District Court for the Eastern District of New York shall be held.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide that United States District Court for Eastern District of New York shall also be held at Town of Hempstead.
